header.home.title: Language Explorer
home.content: Welcome to the Language Explorer! This platform helps you explore different languages and their cultural aspects.
about.title: About Us
about.content: Learn more about our team and the mission behind the Language Explorer. Discover how we strive to make language learning accessible and enjoyable for everyone.
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: Get in touch with us if you have any questions, feedback, or partnership opportunities. We would love to hear from you!
